title: Bug 49045JMX Enhancement Provision of MBeanFactory createStandardService
description: Bug 49045JMX Enhancement Provision of MBeanFactory createStandardService This would become an issue for future enhancements of JMX support in Tomcat. As per discussions with Mark, this enhancement is suggested as a starting point for possible future enhancements in JMX support.
OB: Currently MBeanFactory doesn't have a method for creating a new StandardService MBean.
